entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.3°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 83 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 17 except minus 13 near the Rockies.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17 except minus 13 near the Rockies. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Fog developing. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Fog developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
